name: Lakkaberry Madame
desc: A chopped chicken dish. Said to have gained real popularity in Nod-Krai, despite being an imported recipe. It has a sweet-and-sour flavor that is indeed most delectable. A different flavor, certainly, though judging by the name... was the base dish the Sweet Madame, you wonder?

value.text: Restores 22% of Max HP and an additional 1,200 HP to the selected character.
